Description.Text: Varres hotel offers a sunny Pool, playground, snack bar, restaurant & conference room.Other amenities/services: rooms with bath with shower or bathtub, hair dryer, bathrobe, W.C., mini fridge, telephone, safety deposit box, air conditioning, satellite TV and a large balcony with views of the swimming pool, the surrounding olive groves or the blue Ionian Sea. There is also free Wi-Fi internet access, room service and daily maid service.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located on Bohali hill, 15 minute walk to the town of Zakynthos (1,2km) and a 3 minute car ride to Tsilivi beach (2km). It is just 2 Km from the central port and 5 Km from the airport.
